posts.title: Toilet Bowl Coffee Mug
posts.content: The toilet bowl coffee mug is without a doubt the classiest coffee mug in existence, even with the seat left up. It’s an even finer item when you use the toilet bowl coffee mug as a bowl to eat out of, and makes a great gift for people with shitty drink preferences.

posts.title: The Magic Of Not Giving A Fuck Book
posts.content: Stop spending time you don’t have with people you don’t like doing things you don’t want to do. The Magic Of Not Giving A Fuck teaches you how to let go of things like “family drama” or not having the ideal “bikini body” and gets you to focus on what really matters.

posts.title: Shoelace Fastening System
posts.content: Turn the mundane task of tying your shoes into a thing of the past by switching to the shoelace fastening system. It features a unique locking mechanism that’s remarkably secure and easy to lace up – making it ideal for any kind of physical activity.

posts.title: Waterproof And Fireproof Hard Drive
posts.content: Ensure valuable data remains intact in the event of a catastrophe by storing it inside this waterproof and fireproof hard drive. It features a speedy USB 3.0 interface, runs silently, and is practically indestructible – making this an ideal place to store your data.

posts.title: Giant Soccer Ball
posts.content: Score the most amazing goal of your life when playing a match with the giant soccer ball. Perfect for matching your larger than life game, this over-sized soccer ball will test your skills with every play in addition to providing humor and levity during competitive games.

posts.title: 3D Safari Cookie Cutters
posts.content: Make your baking come to life after preparing a batch of treats using the 3D safari cookie cutters. These unique cookie cutters create puzzle-like pieces you assemble to create various creatures from the animal kingdom – like a mighty lion or a giraffe.

posts.title: Dinosaur Cookie Cutters
posts.content: Get pre-historic with snack time using these dinosaur cookie cutters. Featuring templates of everyone’s favorite dinosaurs – such as the T-Rex and the Triceratops – these unique cookie cutters are perfect for making some tasty treats that will bite back!

posts.title: Super Mario Bros Thwomp Pillow
posts.content: No game themed bedroom would be complete without the Super Mario Bros Thwomp pillow. Instead of crushing you with their mighty power, this comfortable pillow will accent your room with a fun nostalgic touch while providing a cozy place to rest your head.

posts.title: Solar Powered Cooker
posts.content: Go green at your next outdoor cookoff by grilling up your food on the solar powered cooker. On sunny days you’ll be able to boil water in just 10 minutes while reaching grilling temperatures of up to 750F – all while being able to cater to different cookware.

posts.title: Boba Fett String Lights
posts.content: Add the perfect touch to your geeky Christmas tree with these Boba Fett string lights. They’re designed with intricate detailing and are shaped like miniature replicas of Boba Fett’s iconic helmet – a must have for any Star Wars themed holiday celebration.

posts.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Shot Game
posts.content: The tic-tac-toe shot game is the only version of this classic game that will never end in a frustrating draw. Each player gets the chance to drink up to 5 shots a game so whether the round produces a clear winner or not, you’ll be too drunk to care about the outcome.

posts.title: Corn Popper Toy Keychain
posts.content: Carry a small piece of your childhood wherever you go with the corn popper toy keychain. It’s a miniature version of the classic children’s toy we all grew up with and owned at one point in our lives – and it also works great for providing a small distraction when boredom strikes.
